prompts: Create a muscular Pokemon that exudes strength and confidence with a vibrant color palette.
I want a fighting-type Pokemon with multiple arms and a fierce expression, set in an urban backdrop.
Generate a Pokemon that showcases incredible agility and power, with striking blue and yellow details.
Make a humanoid Pokemon with a robust build, displaying its skills in an intense battle scene.
Imagine a Pokemon that represents determination and resilience, featuring eye-catching colors and a dynamic pose.
Design a Pokemon with an impressive physique, showcasing its fighting prowess against a mountainous landscape.
Show me a powerful Pokemon with a bold personality, combining elements of strength and speed in its design.
